title: [feature request] Adding Padding functions to nn.functional
body_html:
I noticed that the padding layers are missing in torch.nn.functional. For consistency, e.g., similar to the pooling ops etc., I think it would be a good idea to add these.

If that sounds like a good idea, I am happy to help with this via a PR.
body_text:
I noticed that the padding layers are missing in torch.nn.functional. For consistency, e.g., similar to the pooling ops etc., I think it would be a good idea to add these.
If that sounds like a good idea, I am happy to help with this via a PR.
body:
I noticed that the padding layers are missing in `torch.nn.functional`. For consistency, e.g., similar to the pooling ops etc., I think it would be a good idea to add these. 

If that sounds like a good idea, I am happy to help with this via a PR.
